title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Metadata-Based Instructional Design for Digital Learning Object Extraction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three digital learning objects by math concept from HTML documents and Word files
Learners can apply instructional design characteristic-based tags to extracted learning objects according to metadata standards (IMS, LOM)
Learners can produce one digital learning package for secondary-level math education through PBL team activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
